name: Rise of the Eternal
description: Rise of the Eternal is a 2D side scrolling game developed in Unreal Engine 5, it seamlessly combines platformer and beat'em up aspects. Currently available in Early Access, players get an exclusive glimpse of the first level and encounter one enemy type, contributing to the game's ongoing development. The pixel art design gives a nostalgic yet modern feel, offering a visually distinctive experience. As players embark on this early journey, they not only face the challenges of the first level but also contribute valuable feedback that will shape the future content of this promising title.
